EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Natural Adept
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain 8 hit points, +1 to hit and damage in Wolf and Bear Forms for this and every other core in the tree. In Wolf Form also gain 1 sneak attack die for this and every other core taken.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Nature's Senses
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your attacks penetrate 10% of your target's fortification. You gain a +3 bonus to Spot, Listen and Search.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Nature's Bounty
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You have mastered the art of wielding divine magic in animal form, and using it to empower your body in physical combat. While in animal form, the cooldown penalty for non-animal form spells is reduced from 2.5 times the usual length to 2.0.
This benefit will not stack with the Magical Beast enhancement in the Nature's protector tree.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: A True Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: While in Wolf or Bear form you gain a +1 Competence bonus to Critical Multiplier. You must have a weapon equipped to gain this benefit.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Howl of the Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Casting Howl of Terror now grants you the effect Howl of the Hunter for 10 seconds which grants +10 Exceptional bonus to Doublestrike, 5% bonus to spell critical and 15% to spell critical damage to all spells. This will only occur once every 30 seconds.
You gain a +5% Primal bonus to Maximum Hit Points.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Beast Form Mastery
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You have mastered the art of wielding divine magic in animal form and using it to empower your body in physical combat. While in animal form, the cooldown penalty for non-animal form spells is reduced from 2.5 times the usual length to 1.5. Does not stack with Nature's Protector cores.
Passive: You gain +2 Strength and Wisdom and +10% Doublestrike and +10 PRR.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Extra Wild Empathy
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Become close to nature or dead to the world.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Extra Wild Empathy
EnhancementSelection.Description: +[1/2/3] Wild Empathy use per rest. +[1/2/3] Improved Wild Empathy use per rest (if you have this ability). +[5/10/15] Positive Spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Snapping Jaws
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Whenever you Bluff or use an ability that triggers a Bluff check such as Baiting Bite, your target is debuffed losing -[2/4/6] AC, and you gain a stack of Snapping Jaw for +[2/4/6] AC for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Take Down
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increase Trip DCs by [1/2/3]

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Bestial Nature
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Reflex and Fortitude Saves are increased by +[1/2].

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Athletic Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Balance, Jump, Move Silently and Hide Skills. Rank 3: You gain a +1 bonus to Reflex and Fortitude saves.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Flight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose between Flight or Play Dead.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Flight
EnhancementSelection.Description: Cooldown: 1 minute 30 seconds. Gain a +20% Dodge bonus for [10/20/30] seconds that ignores your dodge cap. Costs 1 Wild Empathy.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ghost Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Passive: Gain Ghost Touch while in Wolf Forms on your melee attacks.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Brother Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: What kind of wolf are you?

EnhancementSelection.Name: Brother Wolf
EnhancementSelection.Description: While your wolf pet is alive and within 40 meters, it gains 15 hit points every [12/9/6] seconds and [10/15/20] MRR and PRR and you also gain +[1/2/3] to hit and damage.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Lone Wolf
EnhancementSelection.Description: You gain +[1/2/3] bonus to hit, and +[1/2/3] Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Action Boost: Double Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Cooldown: 30 seconds Gain +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to Doublestrike for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Fight
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] base melee damage and +[1/2/3] AC while in any Bear or Wolf form.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Prey on the Weak
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain a +[8/15]% damage bonus on helpless targets.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ghost Wolf Pack
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +20% Damage +2 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 1 minute Wolf Form Melee Attack: When you trigger this, spectral pack mates appear to assault all foes before you. On Hit: applies a 5 second confusion effect with no save. Bosses are immune to the confusion. When you activate this attack, you gain 35% Incorporeal defense for 10 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Essence of the Shrike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Striking a blow focuses your mind and body. When you critically hit an enemy while in any Wolf or Bear form, you gain [10/20] temporary spell points for 8 seconds. Passive: +[5/10] Positive Spell power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ability I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Fatal Harrier
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Killing an enemy grants you a 5% enchantment bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. You also gain a +1 bonus to Reflex saves. This stacks [1/3/5] times.
Enemies your own level or higher have a 100% chance of inspiring your Ferocity to greater heights. For every level below you, the chances are reduced by 20%. A monster two levels below you only has a 60% chance of creating this effect.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Four Legs Good
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You ignore most effects that would knock you down. Requires: Any Wolf, Bear or Tree form.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ferocity
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Gain +[2/4/6] melee power in Wolf or Bear form. Double this bonus if using Barbarian Rage or Rage of the Beast.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Great White Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Increase the power of your Wolf Form.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Bad Wolf
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +15 Acid and Poison Spell power. In Plague or Blighted Wolf Form gain 30% Acid Absorption.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Great White Wolf
EnhancementSelection.Description: Gain +30 Cold spell power. In Winter Wolf form gain 30% Cold absorption.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Ability II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Choose either Strength or Wisdom

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Alpha Strike
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals +[20/30/50]% Damage Spell Point Cost: [12/9/6] Cooldown: [18/15/12] seconds Cleave Attack: You fight for leadership amongst your foes. On Hit: targets above 85% health it reduce their attack Melee, Range, and Universal Spell Power by 25 for 15 seconds.
Requires: Any Wolf, Bear or Tree form.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Swift Hunter
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While in Wolf form you gain Evasion. Armor restrictions apply as normal.
While in Wolf or Plague Wolf Form, your Combat Speed Bonus to Attack Speed is improved to 15%.
While in Blighted Wolf Form, your Combat Speed Bonus to Attack Speed is improved to 20%.
While in Winter Wolf Form, Your Combat Speed Bonus to Attack Speed is improved to 30%.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Throat Rip
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds. Requires Wolf Form. Melee attack that strikes 3 times, adds 6 sneak attack dice on each attack. Each hit on a living target inflicts a Bleed which causes 1d6 every 3 seconds for 18 seconds. Bleed stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% melee power.
Target must also make a Fortitude save or will be silenced for 15 seconds. Bosses are immune to Silence but take a 25 point spell power debuff.
Stun vs Fortitude DC: 10 + Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) + Stun bonuses.

DC.Name: Nature's Warrior: Throat Rip
DC.Description:
Requires Wolf Form. Melee attack that strikes 3 times, adds 6 sneak attack dice on each attack. Each hit on a living target inflicts a Bleed which causes 1d6 every 3 seconds for 18 seconds. Bleed stacks up to 10 times and scales with 200% melee power.
Target must also make a Fortitude save or will be silenced for 15 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Jaws of the Wolf
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: After using Jaws of Winter or Jaws of Doom you gain 10 times your character level in temporary hit points for 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Nature's Warrior: Go for the Kill
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals +40% Damage +1 Critical Multiplier +5 Critical Threat Range Cooldown: 20 seconds. Requires Wolf form. You charge your target and strike them in an attempt to knock them down. This also grants yourself a +15 melee power boost for 30 seconds.
Charging from a distance of over 10 meters the melee power bonus is doubled. Deals an additional 50 points of damage to helpless targets. Scales with melee power. A successful Balance check negates Knockdown.
Trip vs Balance DC: 10 + Druid Level + Max(Str, Wis) + Trip bonuses.

DC.Name: Nature's Warrior: Go for the Kill
DC.Description:
Requires Wolf form. You charge your target and strike them in an attempt to knock them down. This also grants yourself a +15 melee power boost for 30 seconds.
Charging from a distance of over 10 meters the melee power bonus is doubled. Deals an additional 50 points of damage to helpless targets. Scales with melee power. A successful Balance check negates Knockdown.
